long.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,:
Get ready for a blast from the past right in your school Chrome browser with "Retro Bowl at School" Chrome Extension! ğŸˆ

Relive the excitement of classic American football gaming during your school breaks. Dive into addictive gameplay, customize your team, and tackle progressively challenging opponents. ğŸ®

Designed to be discreet and school-friendly, enjoy gaming without interruptions to your studies. No downloads neededâ€”just install and play instantly. ğŸš€

Bring the nostalgia of retro gaming to your school desk with Retro Bowl at School Chrome Extension. Install now and kick off the fun!

# Play more games on the top-left menu.
long.bg,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fi,fil,fr,he,hi,:
To win Uno, you must be the first player to get rid of all the cards in your hand. Choose your avatar, play your best game, and start the fun!

How to play:

Use your mouse to play cards.
Match the color or number of the top card on the discard pile.
Use action cards to change the direction of play, force your opponents to draw cards, or skip their turns.
Be the first player to get rid of all your cards to win!

Classic Uno game features:

5+ characters to choose from
Easy controls
Minimal animation
2D graphics

- Play others games on the top-left menu
